includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Multi-award-winning drama starring Bryan Cranston as a chemistry teacher who turns to making crystal meth after he's diagnosed with cancer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Multi-award-winning drama starring Bryan Cranston as a chemistry teacher who turns to making crystal meth after he's diagnosed with cancer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Multi-award-winning drama starring Bryan Cranston as a chemistry teacher who turns to making crystal meth after he's diagnosed with cancer.

includedAssets.title: Cat's In The Bag...
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep2 - Cat's In The Bag...
includedAssets.synopsis: Jesse and Walt try to dispose of the bodies of two dealers, while Skyler grows suspicious of Walt's behaviour.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jesse and Walt try to dispose of the bodies of two dealers, while Skyler grows suspicious of Walt's behaviour.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jesse and Walt try to dispose of the bodies of two dealers, while Skyler grows suspicious of Walt's behaviour.

includedAssets.title: ...And The Bag's In The River
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - ...And The Bag's In The River
includedAssets.synopsis: Walt wrestles with whether or not to kill Krazy-8, while Marie asks Hank to scare Walter Jr off drugs.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walt wrestles with whether or not to kill Krazy-8, while Marie asks Hank to scare Walter Jr off drugs.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walt wrestles with whether or not to kill Krazy-8, while Marie asks Hank to scare Walter Jr off drugs.

includedAssets.title: Cancer Man
includedAssets.synopsis: Hank tries to uncover the identity of the new drug kingpin that has emerged, Walt tells his family he has cancer and Jesse gets kicked out of his parents' house.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hank tries to uncover the identity of the new drug kingpin that has emerged, Walt tells his family he has cancer and Jesse gets kicked out of home.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hank tries to uncover the identity of the new drug kingpin that has emerged, Walt tells his family he has cancer and Jesse gets kicked out of his parents' house.

includedAssets.title: Gray Matter
includedAssets.synopsis: As Walt's family try to persuade him to undergo chemotherapy, an old friend offers him the funds - but will he accept?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Walt's family try to persuade him to undergo chemotherapy, an old friend offers him the funds - but will he accept?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Walt's family try to persuade him to undergo chemotherapy, an old friend offers him the funds - but will he accept?

includedAssets.title: Crazy Handful Of Nothin'
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep6 - Crazy Handful Of Nothin'
includedAssets.synopsis: Walt and Jesse come to an agreement - Walt cooks the meth and Jesse sells it - but things quickly take a dangerous turn.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walt and Jesse come to an agreement - Walt cooks the meth and Jesse sells it - but things quickly take a dangerous turn.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walt and Jesse come to an agreement - Walt cooks the meth and Jesse sells it - but things quickly take a dangerous turn.

includedAssets.title: A-No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
includedAssets.synopsis: Walt and Jesse struggle to keep up with demand, leading them to come up with a new recipe. Meanwhile, Skyler confronts Marie about her shoplifting.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walt and Jesse struggle to keep up with demand, leading them to come up with a new recipe. Meanwhile, Skyler confronts Marie about her shoplifting.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walt and Jesse struggle to keep up with demand, leading them to come up with a new recipe. Meanwhile, Skyler confronts Marie about her shoplifting.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: When mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with cancer, he begins cooking and selling methamphetamine to financially provide for his family.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with cancer, he begins cooking methamphetamine to financially provide for his family.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with cancer, he begins cooking and selling methamphetamine to financially provide for his family.

includedIn.title: Breaking Bad
includedIn.synopsis: When mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with cancer, he decides to risk everything to ensure his family's future. Teaming up with low-level drug dealer Jesse Pinkman, Walt begins cooking and selling methamphetamine to make some quick cash, but the pair gradually become immersed in a dark and dangerous new world.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A mild-mannered chemistry teacher turns his talents to cooking meth after he's diagnosed with cancer.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: When mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with cancer, he decides to risk everything to ensure his family's future. Teaming up with low-level drug dealer Jesse Pinkman, Walt begins cooking and selling methamphetamine to make some quick cash, but the pair gradually become immersed in a dark and dangerous new world.
